data.text: @nikkitwitta Hi, please check your DM regarding that matter. Thank you.
@aerialpenn Please contact our reservation center at 1-800-227-4262 for the further assistance. Thank you.
@danieljgay We will try our best to let our airport staff to know about your inconvenience. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
@danieljgay however, we were not be able to reach them due to current airport situation.
@danieljgay We apologize for the inconvenience. We are trying to contact to our BKK airport regarding this matter,
Thank you for everyone who participated for this event, truly appreciate it! Visit our IG page to check the winners! https://t.co/b6eQMThM8L
@JimCavale We apologize for the inconvenience. If you leave comments on  https://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ, customer relation dept will follow up.
@cmllxfrncs > lost & found, as all items found within the property grounds of Asiana Airlines are posted here. Thank you.
@cmllxfrncs We advise you to please check our Lost and Found website : https://t.co/nGVvAPsntu > information & service > baggage
@stormchaser812 Thank you for contacting us. How may I assist you?
@calitexa Glad to hear that from you, Kelsey. Thank you so much and hope to have you on board again soon! :)
@Marcelloscherme Please contact at 1-800-227-4262 or email us at usasianaclub@flyasiana.com. Thank you!
@RinaMoskalenko If you have further inquiries, please visit https://t.co/p1Keh1AtTJ and our customer relation dept will follow up.Thank you.
@RinaMoskalenko 24 hours prior to your flight departure. Please DO NOT login and have your popup blockers OFF.
@RinaMoskalenko We apologize for the inconvenience. We value your comment. Checkin and seating can be arranged on our website,
